reviews.review: Alot of toxic russians in game
The best game in the world
very nice very good very cool very fixe

CS has been a great game since 'we've met' for the first time back in 90s :) Done all the paying online, in LANs, tournaments, different countries, but yet, I'm still just a 'casual' (and not a very good one anymore lol) who kind of re-united with the game recently in his early 40s... 

The only issue always was, is and I'm afraid will be wide-spread cheating.  That's the only really frustrating thing with this game.

Have fun!
